BatchGetResourceConfigurations.title: BatchGetResourceConfigurations
BatchGetResourceConfigurations.summary: Queries the configurations of multiple resources in your account.

CreateDeliveryChannel.title: CreateDeliveryChannel
CreateDeliveryChannel.summary: Creates a resource delivery channel for the current account.

DisableMultiAccountResourceCenter.title: DisableMultiAccountResourceCenter
DisableMultiAccountResourceCenter.summary: Disables the cross-account resource search feature by using the management account of a resource directory or a delegated administrator account of Resource Center.

EnableMultiAccountResourceCenter.title: EnableMultiAccountResourceCenter
EnableMultiAccountResourceCenter.summary: Enables the cross-account resource search feature by using the management account of a resource directory or a delegated administrator account of Resource Center.

ExecuteMultiAccountSQLQuery.title: ExecuteMultiAccountSQLQuery
ExecuteMultiAccountSQLQuery.summary: Executes an SQL statement to query resources across accounts.

ExecuteSQLQuery.title: ExecuteSQLQuery
ExecuteSQLQuery.summary: Executes an SQL statement to query the resources that can be accessed within the current account.

GetDeliveryChannel.title: GetDeliveryChannel
GetDeliveryChannel.summary: Queries the information about a delivery channel within the current account.

GetDeliveryChannelStatistics.title: GetDeliveryChannelStatistics
GetDeliveryChannelStatistics.summary: Queries the statistics of a resource delivery channel in the current account.

GetExampleQuery.title: GetExampleQuery
GetExampleQuery.summary: Queries the information about a sample query template.

GetMultiAccountDeliveryChannel.title: GetMultiAccountDeliveryChannel
GetMultiAccountDeliveryChannel.summary: Queries the information about a cross-account resource delivery channel.

GetMultiAccountDeliveryChannelStatistics.title: GetMultiAccountDeliveryChannelStatistics
GetMultiAccountDeliveryChannelStatistics.summary: Queries the statistics on a multi-account delivery channel.

GetMultiAccountResourceCenterServiceStat.title: GetMultiAccountResourceCenterServiceStatus
GetMultiAccountResourceCenterServiceStat.summary: Queries the status of the cross-account resource search feature by using the management account of a resource directory or a delegated administrator account of Resource Center.

GetMultiAccountResourceConfiguration.title: GetMultiAccountResourceConfiguration
GetMultiAccountResourceConfiguration.summary: Queries the configurations of a resource within the management account or a member of a resource directory.

GetMultiAccountResourceCounts.title: GetMultiAccountResourceCounts
GetMultiAccountResourceCounts.summary: Queries the number of resources within the management account and multiple members of a resource directory.

GetResourceCenterServiceStatus.title: GetResourceCenterServiceStatus
GetResourceCenterServiceStatus.summary: Queries the status of the Resource Center service.

GetResourceConfiguration.title: GetResourceConfiguration
GetResourceConfiguration.summary: Queries the configurations of a resource within the current account.

GetResourceCounts.title: GetResourceCounts
GetResourceCounts.summary: Queries the number of resources in your account that you have permission to access.

GetSavedQuery.title: GetSavedQuery
GetSavedQuery.summary: Queries the information about a custom query template.

ListDeliveryChannels.title: ListDeliveryChannels
ListDeliveryChannels.summary: Queries a list of delivery channels within the current account.

ListMultiAccountDeliveryChannels.title: ListMultiAccountDeliveryChannels
ListMultiAccountDeliveryChannels.summary: Queries a list of delivery channels in resource directory mode.

ListMultiAccountResourceGroups.title: ListMultiAccountResourceGroups
ListMultiAccountResourceGroups.summary: Queries the resource groups within the management account or a member in a resource directory.

ListMultiAccountResourceRelationships.title: ListMultiAccountResourceRelationships
ListMultiAccountResourceRelationships.summary: Queries the relationships between resources within the management account or members of your resource directory.

ListMultiAccountTagKeys.title: ListMultiAccountTagKeys
ListMultiAccountTagKeys.summary: Queries the tag keys of resources within the management account or a member of your resource directory.

ListMultiAccountTagValues.title: ListMultiAccountTagValues
ListMultiAccountTagValues.summary: Queries the tag values of resources within the management account or a member of a resource directory by using the management account of the resource directory or a delegated administrator account of Resource Center.

ListResourceRelationships.title: ListResourceRelationships
ListResourceRelationships.summary: Queries a list of resource relationships on which the current account has access permissions.

ListResourceTypes.title: ListResourceTypes
ListResourceTypes.summary: Queries the metadata of resource types

ListTagKeys.title: ListTagKeys
ListTagKeys.summary: Queries the tag keys of resources within the current account.

ListTagValues.title: ListTagValues
ListTagValues.summary: Queries the tag values of resources within the current account.

SearchMultiAccountResources.title: SearchMultiAccountResources
SearchMultiAccountResources.summary: Searches for resources in the management account and multiple member accounts of a resource directory.

SearchResources.title: SearchResources
SearchResources.summary: Searches for resources in your current account that you are permitted to access.
